players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Charlie: "Diana, I think you're lying to save yourself. Maybe you're the mafia framing me for Bob's death."
You: "Diana, as the detective, your claim is critical. Charlie, your defense seems weak. I'm leaning towards trusting Diana's investigation for now."
You: "I trust Diana's investigation. Charlie is the mafia. We must vote him out to win."
Diana: "Charlie, your accusation makes no sense. Why would I, as detective, lie about my investigation? Alice is right—we must vote you out to secure the town's victory."
Charlie: "Diana, your claim is suspicious. If you're the detective, why frame me so quickly? We should vote you out instead."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
